T02D2477:172a-17: // de ni sgrub pa chen po zhes bya ba gzhan yan lag bzhi ba'i mtshan nyid de /

T02D2477:172a-20: sgrub pa chen bor bshad pa yin //
T02D2477:172a-22: longs spyod pa bzhi pa'i gnas skabs de nyid kyi

T02D2477:172a-27: de rnams kyi bag chags kyi mtshan nyid rnams kyi
T02D2477:172a-28: tha ma tha ma rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D2477:172a-29: ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ro //

T02D2477:172a-32: rgyud las gsungs pa'i phyag rgya des gshin rje mthar 'byin dang /

T02D2477:172a-37: zhe sdang zad pa'i ye shes ni shes rab mthar 'byin pa'o //
T02D2477:172a-38: 'dod chags zad pa'i ye shes ni padma mthar 'byin pa'o //
T02D2477:172a-39: sgrib pa thams cad zad pa'i ye shes ni bgegs
T02D2477:172a-40: mthar 'byin te chos kyi sku thob pa ni bgegs

T02D2477:172b-0: de skad du yang gsungs @172b pa ;
T02D2477:172b-1: gti mug gti mug longs spyod pas //
T02D2477:172b-2: gshin rje mthar phyin gti mug zad //
T02D2477:172b-4: sgrib pa kun zad ye shes ni //

T02D2477:172b-13: rnam par bral pa'i sar 'gro ba rnams dang /
T02D2477:172b-14: der song ba rnams dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs par bsnyen pa dang /
T02D2477:172b-17: sgrub pa chen po'i mtshan nyid rnams ni shin tu
T02D2477:172b-18: rnam par dag pa'i ye shes thob pa'i rtags sam
T02D2477:172b-19: rgyu ste / shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba'i rim pa dang ji lta ba bzhin du sbyor ro //
T02D2477:172b-21: so sor rig pa tsam dang /
T02D2477:172b-23: ye shes skye ba ni bde ba chen po ro
T02D2477:172b-24: gcig pa rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'i dper gyur
T02D2477:172b-25: pa ste / dpe dang ldan pa yang dag par

T02D2477:172b-29: de'i rgyu sgrub thabs rnam pa bzhi bo des 'dir

T02D2477:172b-32: de'i rjes la las thams cad rnam par dag pas
T02D2477:172b-33: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par
T02D2477:172b-35: las rnam par dag pas 'bras bu rnam par dag pa thob pa yin pas na'o //
T02D2477:172b-36: de skad du yang gsungs pa /
T02D2477:172b-37: las rnams thams cad rnam dag na //
T02D2477:172b-38: nyon mongs rdo rje'i sgrib pa 'dag / las rnams thams cad rnam dag pa'i //
T02D2477:172b-39: las las 'bras bu dag pa skye //
T02D2477:172b-41: 'dis na bsgrub bya chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid ni
T02D2477:172b-42: sgrib pa med cing zad pa dang 'jig pa med

T02D2477:172b-44: shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi

T02D2477:173a-2: so sor rtog pa dang bya ba nan tan gyi
T02D2477:173a-3: ye shes kyi bdag nyid can longs spyod rdzogs pa
T02D2477:173a-4: dang / sprul pa'i sku'i rgyu bsgrub bya de dang
T02D2477:173a-5: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs su bcas pa sngags
T02D2477:173a-6: kyi theg pa 'dir phyag rgya'i dpe las mtshon pa
T02D2477:173a-7: dang / yin no // 'dis na sgrub thabs kyi
T02D2477:173a-8: mtshan nyid kyi de ma thag par yan lag mchog
T02D2477:173a-9: dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya dang 'dus nas /
T02D2477:173a-10: rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor byang chub kyi sems
T02D2477:173a-11: phyin pa na man ngag ji lta bas padma la
T02D2477:173a-12: nor bu'i thor tos mnan nas rlung gis rnam par
T02D2477:173a-13: rgyal ba la goms par bya zhing /
T02D2477:173a-14: yi ge phat la sogs pa'i sngags kyis yang dag par gzung bar bya'o //
T02D2477:173a-15: de'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba de ni rnam
T02D2477:173a-16: par mi chod cing brjod du med par dbang po'i
T02D2477:173a-17: tshogs rnams so sor thim par gyur pa bde ba
T02D2477:173a-18: chen po 'ba' zhig tsam du snang bar shin tu
T02D2477:173a-19: rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes
T02D2477:173a-20: kyi rang bzhin chos kyi sku nye bar mtshon par
T02D2477:173a-21: byed pa ste / gnyis su med cing brjod pa
T02D2477:173a-22: las 'das pa tsam gyi ngo bor snang bar de
T02D2477:173a-23: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs gcig tu zhi
T02D2477:173a-24: bde gsung ba'i phyir na de thob par bya ba'i
T02D2477:173a-25: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dper gyur pa ni /
T02D2477:173a-26: dpe de dang dpe dang ldan pa dag mi phyed
T02D2477:173a-27: par mos pas de kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin
T02D2477:173a-28: du de nyid 'dir mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis
T02D2477:173a-29: 'di la yang dag par mtshon par bya'o //
T02D2477:173a-30: yang dag par mtshon pa brtan par byas nas mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa ji lta ba dang /
T02D2477:173a-31: dam tshig ji lta bar lha'i dngos po'i rnal 'byor byas la /
T02D2477:173a-32: snying gar zla ba dang yi ge h'um la sogs
T02D2477:173a-33: pa la lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor nam mkha'
T02D2477:173a-34: rdo rjer gus pas rgyun mchad par yun ring por
T02D2477:173a-36: dam tshig gi spyod pa dang ldan par man ngag ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D2477:173a-37: ji lta ba bzhin du de bsgoms na shin tu
T02D2477:173a-38: bde ba der rab tu myur bar 'thob pa yin
T02D2477:173a-39: no // de ltar phyogs gnyis pa'i smras pa yin no //
T02D2477:173a-40: phyogs gsum pa'i dgongs pa ni 'di yin te /
T02D2477:173a-41: sgrub pa'i thabs dang bcas pa ma yin pa chos kyi sku tsam dang /
T02D2477:173b-0: sgrub pa'i thabs dang bcas pa tsam ni mtshon @173b par bya ba ma yin no //
T02D2477:173b-1: de kho na tsam zhig ni theg pa chen po
T02D2477:173b-2: 'dir bsgrub par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro
T02D2477:173b-4: de tsam gyis ni sems can gyi don sbyor ba med pas na'o //
T02D2477:173b-5: de lta bas na gzhan sku gnyis po yang ye
T02D2477:173b-6: shes yang dag par bsdu zhing bsgrub par bya ba
T02D2477:173b-7: yin te / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa'i
T02D2477:173b-8: theg par yang chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa
T02D2477:173b-9: der gyur pa'i nang du chos kyi sku'i ye shes
T02D2477:173b-10: chos kyi sku zhes bya ba bsgrub par bya ba'i
T02D2477:173b-11: yin te / gtso bo'o // der gnas pa na dngos po thams cad dang /
T02D2477:173b-12: don thams cad kyi rang bzhin gzugs brnyan lta bur gsal ba'i me long lta bu'i ye shes dang /
T02D2477:173b-13: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam par mngon du rtogs pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang /
T02D2477:173b-14: don gyi rnam pa thams cad kyi dngos po thams
T02D2477:173b-15: cad ji lta ba de kho na bzhin du yongs
T02D2477:173b-16: su bcad pa'i thugs su chud pa'i so sor rtog
T02D2477:173b-18: ye shes gsum po'i rang bzhin de rnams ni longs
T02D2477:173b-19: spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes bya ba 'bras bu gzhan
T02D2477:173b-20: du gyur pa'o // de bzhin du 'gro ba'i don
T02D2477:173b-21: gyi dngos po thams cad mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid can
T02D2477:173b-22: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes ni 'bras bu
T02D2477:173b-23: sprul pa'i sku zhes bya bar 'dod pas so //
T02D2477:173b-24: de nas sngags kyi theg par yang lugs ji lta
T02D2477:173b-25: bar rgyud rnams ji lta ba bzhin du shin tu
T02D2477:173b-26: rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo
T02D2477:173b-27: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin mi bskyod pa'i ye
T02D2477:173b-28: shes kyi bdag nyid shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
T02D2477:173b-29: ye shes kyi ngo bo ni chos kyi sku zhes
T02D2477:173b-30: bya ste bsgrub par bya ba'i gtso bo'o //
T02D2477:173b-31: de bzhin du rnam pa sna tshogs par snang ba'i
T02D2477:173b-32: dngos po thams cad du gsal ba ni me long
T02D2477:173b-33: lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin te rnam par
T02D2477:173b-35: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa'i
T02D2477:173b-36: rang bzhin ni mnyam nyid kyi ye shes kyi rang
T02D2477:173b-38: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D2477:173b-39: don thams cad kyi dngos po kun gyi rjes su
T02D2477:173b-40: rtog cing yongs su gcod pa'i mtshan nyid ni so
T02D2477:173b-41: sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin te /
T02D2477:173b-42: 'od dpag tu med pa rang gi ngo bo'o //
T02D2477:173b-43: de rnams ni bsgrub par bya ba'i 'bras bu gnyis pa ste longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes bya'o //
T02D2477:173b-44: de bzhin du 'gro ba'i don rnam pa sna tshogs
T02D2477:174a-0: par mdzad pa'i mtshan nyid can bya ba @174a *
T02D2477:174a-1: // nan tan gyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin ni don yod grub pa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D2477:174a-2: bsgrub par bya ba'i 'bras bu gzhan ma sprul pa'i sku zhes bya ba'o //
T02D2477:174a-3: de ltar na sku gsum char yang bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
T02D2477:174a-4: de nyid kyis na bsgrub par bya ba gang yin
T02D2477:174a-5: pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang
T02D2477:174a-6: mnyam pa'i phyag rgyas brda ji lta ba bzhin du
T02D2477:174a-7: mtshon par bya ba yin no //
T02D2477:174a-8: 'dis na shes rab kyi dbang bskur ba'i dus su
T02D2477:174a-9: rdo rje nor bu'i rtse mor phyin pa'i byang chub
T02D2477:174a-10: kyi sems kyi gnas de nyid la phyogs gnyis par
T02D2477:174a-11: smras pa'i tshul gyis man ngag ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2477:174a-12: du byang chub kyi sems la brtan par byas pas
T02D2477:174a-13: de'i lhan cig byung ba ni bdag dang gzhan du
T02D2477:174a-14: dbye bar snang ba dang bral ba gang yin pa

T02D2477:174a-16: gnyis su med par snang ba rnam par g-yeng ba'i
T02D2477:174a-17: tshogs thams cad so sor thim pa ngag gi rnam
T02D2477:174a-18: par rtog pa la sogs pa mnan pa'i rang bzhin
T02D2477:174a-19: so so rang rig pa gcig pur gnas shing gzhi
T02D2477:174a-20: dang bral ba / bde ba nam mkha' dang mnyam

T02D2477:174a-22: dang bral ba / bya'o // de ni chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa'o //
T02D2477:174a-24: rnal 'byor pa ni ji srid du //
T02D2477:174a-25: byang chub sems gtong mi byed na //
T02D2477:174a-26: dga' ba las skyes brjod med bde //
T02D2477:174a-27: de srid rnam par mi gcod thob //
T02D2477:174a-29: byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i thor to nas thon kar yang dag par byung ste /
T02D2477:174a-30: gnas med par gnas pa yang yul rab tu nye
T02D2477:174a-31: ba lta bu la dmigs ba'i dbang gis kha phyir
T02D2477:174a-32: bltas pa'i byang chub kyi sems bde ba'i dngos bor
T02D2477:174a-33: longs spyod pa'i ye shes rang rig pa de ni
T02D2477:174a-34: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa'o //
T02D2477:174a-35: shes rab kyi padmo gang yin pa'i nang du byang
T02D2477:174a-36: chub kyi sems longs spyod pa'i ngo bo de rdo
T02D2477:174a-37: rje nor bu las phyir bltas nas thog ma 'phros
T02D2477:174a-38: pa'i yongs su dga' ba rang rig pa de ni
T02D2477:174a-39: sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D2477:174a-40: de nyid kyis na sku gsum po rnams dus ji
T02D2477:174a-41: lta bar phyag rgyas man ngag ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2477:174a-42: du mngon du brtan par mtshon par bya zhing ji
T02D2477:174a-43: lta ba bzhin du mngon par rtogs par bya'o //
T02D2477:174b-0: de ni lha'i dngos po'i phyag @174b rgya dang /
T02D2477:174b-1: sngags kyi dngos po'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor chen po'i rtsa ba ste /
T02D2477:174b-2: de sngon du byas la de nas phyis ni gnyis
T02D2477:174b-3: par gyur pa'i dngos po dam tshig dang bcas par
T02D2477:174b-4: bsgoms na shin tu myur bar sku rnams myur du
T02D2477:174b-6: phyogs gsum pa ni de ltar smra bar sems te /
T02D2477:174b-7: kye'i rdo rje la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud
T02D2477:174b-8: rnams su sku gsum po'i bdag nyid bsgrub par bya

T02D2477:174b-10: kyi dbang dus mtshon par bya bar rigs so zhes

T02D2477:174b-12: skyes pa'i rang bzhin gtso bo chos kyi sku tsam
T02D2477:174b-13: mtshon ba yin no zhes pa ni gcig go //
T02D2477:174b-14: de nyid dang rnam pa sna tshogs pa la sogs
T02D2477:174b-15: pa'i sgrub thabs kyang ngo zhes pa ni gzhan no
T02D2477:174b-16: // dam tshig ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin
T02D2477:174b-17: gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya de lta bu'i
T02D2477:174b-18: rjes su 'brangs pas chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
T02D2477:174b-19: // sku dang / sprul pa'i sku dang gnyis po

T02D2477:174b-21: // sku dang / gzhan te / 'di ltar snang
T02D2477:174b-22: ba med pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa bde ba
T02D2477:174b-23: chen po rang rig pa bde bar snang ba de
T02D2477:174b-24: ni rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo'i rang bzhin can chos
T02D2477:174b-25: kyi sku'i rab tu mtshon pa ste /
T02D2477:174b-27: dung lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems kyi rang rig
T02D2477:174b-28: pa de ni dpal he ru ka longs spyod rdzogs
T02D2477:174b-32: rnam pa bde ba'i rang bzhin can //
T02D2477:174b-34: de bde 'dod ldon mar ni bshad //
T02D2477:174b-35: ces ba ni de nyid mchog tu dga' bo dang
T02D2477:174b-36: bral ba'i dga' ba'i dbus su mtshon pa yin no
T02D2477:174b-37: zhes mkhas pa rigs pa dang ldan pa rnams de
T02D2477:174b-38: skad du brjod par sems so //
T02D2477:174b-40: mchog dang bral ba'i dbus dag tu //
T02D2477:174b-41: brtan par bya ste te mtshon bya brtag / dga' ba gsum po rnam spangs pa //
T02D2477:174b-42: bral ba'i dang po mtshon par bya //
T02D2477:174b-44: 'o na ni bsgrub par bya ba bde ba chen
T02D2477:174b-45: po zhi ba ma yin pa bsgrub par bya ba'i
T02D2477:174b-46: don gyis na 'dir kye'i rdo rje'i rgyud smad par
T02D2477:174b-48: ji ltar zhe na de gsungs pa //
T02D2477:174b-49: bde ba 'byung ba chen po gang //
T02D2477:174b-50: gang phyir bde bde nyid min //
T02D2477:175a-1: gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa shes
T02D2477:175a-2: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa
T02D2477:175a-3: rnams su yang gnyis su med pa tsam de nyid
T02D2477:175a-4: bsgrub par bya ba yin par gsungs pas /

T02D2477:175a-6: nyid ni dbye ba med de de kho na nyid
T02D2477:175a-7: ma yin par 'gyur ba'i phyir na yang ngo //

T02D2477:175a-9: bu'i dbye ba med pa de ji lta bu zhig
T02D2477:175a-10: yin tshul ni rgyu tha dad pa las 'bras bu

T02D2477:175a-14: gzhan du ni skyed par byed pa ma yin par gol bar 'gyur ro zhen de ma yin te /
T02D2477:175a-15: bsgyur ba dang byed rgyu dag ni dbye bas tha dad par 'gyur ba yin gyi /
T02D2477:175a-16: thob bya thob byed la ni de lta bu med do //
T02D2477:175a-17: de bas de'i thob bya tsam gyi thabs kyi dbye
T02D2477:175a-18: bas rang gi ngo bo de tha dad pa ma

T02D2477:175a-26: su mtshon par bya ba ma yin zhing /
T02D2477:175a-27: mchog dang bral pa'i dbus gang yin par yang de mtshon pa ma yin te /

T02D2477:175a-29: phyir na shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa'i ro
T02D2477:175a-30: rab tu gsal ba tsam bya ba byas par 'gyur
T02D2477:175a-31: ba'i mtshan nyid de ni de'i tshe so sor rig

T02D2477:175a-34: chags dang bral ba dag zad pas bya ba byas

T02D2477:175a-38: nyid 'dis ni mchog tu mya ngan las 'das par
T02D2477:175a-39: rab tu gsal ba tsam ro gcig ba de yang
T02D2477:175a-40: dag par mtshon du rung ngo //

T02D2477:178b-14: de la shes rab kyi yan lag dang yang dag
T02D2477:178b-15: par 'dus pa na lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba
T02D2477:178b-16: chen po la brtan par byas pa'i mtshan nyid gang
T02D2477:178b-17: yin pa de shes rab kyi yan lag tu gnas
T02D2477:178b-18: pa'i phyir na de ni shes rab ye shes kyi
T02D2477:178b-20: yang gang zhig brtan par byas pa'i lhan cig skyes
T02D2477:178b-21: pa'i bde ba chen po mnyam par bzhag pa'i yid
T02D2477:178b-22: kyis ji ltar nus par yan lag thams cad la
T02D2477:178b-23: so sor khyab par bzlog ste /
T02D2477:178b-24: rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang de'i ngo bor byed
T02D2477:178b-25: pa de ni shes rab ye shes ltar gnyis su
T02D2477:178b-26: med cing brjod pa las 'das pa bde ba chen
T02D2477:178b-27: po tsam du snang ba 'di yang sems kyi dbang
T02D2477:178b-29: bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no //
T02D2477:178b-30: zhes pa 'dis ston cing rig par byed do zhes par sems so //
T02D2477:178b-31: 'di ltar blta bar bya ba gang yin pa de
T02D2477:178b-32: ni bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin gyi rnal 'byor
T02D2477:178b-33: du blta bar bya ba gang yin pa'i dam tshig
T02D2477:178b-34: ste / 'di ji lta ba bzhin bsgom par bya ba yin no //
T02D2477:178b-35: de thams cad ni sgrub pa'i thabs dang bcas par
T02D2477:178b-36: kye'i rdo rje las gsungs pa bzhin du bdag gi
T02D2477:178b-37: bla ma mchog gis gsal por bkod cing gsungs bas
T02D2477:178b-38: 'dir ni rgyas par mi byed do //
T02D2477:178b-39: 'di thams cad ni shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i
T02D2477:178b-40: bla mas slob ma la shes rab dang ye shes
T02D2477:178b-41: kyi dbang bskur ba'i dus kyi gnas skabs na de
T02D2477:178b-42: lta bur brda nges rab tu yang dag par dmigs
T02D2477:178b-44: ye shes chen po phra mo ni //
T02D2477:179a-0: @179a * // zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsungs
T02D2477:179a-1: pas de kho na nyid du rab tu rtogs par
T02D2477:179a-2: bya ba yin no zhes par dgongs so //
T02D2477:179a-3: shes rab ye shes dbang bskur ba'i //
T02D2477:179a-4: mtshon bya mtshon byed dbye ba ni //
T02D2477:179a-5: gsum brjod nges par 'dir rtogs la //
T02D2477:179a-6: mkhas pa rnams kyis rigs bzung //
T02D2477:179a-7: dpal ldan 'dus par yongs gsal ba //
T02D2477:179a-8: de snyed gnas pa 'di rnams ni //
T02D2477:179a-9: de nyid phyag rgya'i rjes 'brang phyir //
T02D2477:179a-10: rgyud gzhan du yang rjes 'brang sa pa'o //
T02D2477:179a-11: dpal ldan 'dus dang kye'i rdo rjer //
T02D2477:179a-12: bzhi pa phye bar brjod pa dang //
T02D2477:179a-13: de bzhin 'dir ni dbang bskur nyid //
T02D2477:179a-14: mkhas pa rnams kyis rigs bas long //
T02D2477:179a-15: rgyud gnyis po yi rjes 'brangs nas //
T02D2477:179a-16: rgyud kyi dam tshig de yis kyang //
T02D2477:179a-18: gsungs pa thams cad shes par bya'o //
T02D2477:179a-19: bzhi pa'i dbye ba gang yin pa //
T02D2477:179a-20: lung dang rigs pa phyi rol rnams //
T02D2477:179a-21: rgya ches pa yis bdag 'jigs nas //
T02D2477:179a-22: de dag bzhag ste 'dir ma bris //
T02D2477:179a-23: gnas rnams de dang de rnams la //
T02D2477:179a-24: mkhas pas der ni rab bltas nas //
T02D2477:179a-25: lung dang rigs pa ldan pa yis //
T02D2477:179a-26: de la sun ni dbyung bar bya'o //
T02D2477:179a-27: de nyid 'dir ni mngon par brjod pa dang //
T02D2477:179a-28: dbang bskur mchog gi bsod nams gang 'thob pa //
T02D2477:179a-29: de yis rgyal ba bzang po dpal sbas dang //
T02D2477:179a-30: 'gro 'di ma lus rgyal ba nyid gyur cig / mkhas pa du ma'i dbang bskur des brjod 'di //
T02D2477:179a-31: skye bo dbang bskur phyin ci log zhen pa //
T02D2477:179a-32: de bzlog don du bdag gis 'di bsgyur ba'i //
T02D2477:179a-33: dge bas de dag yang dag dbang thob shog /
T02D2477:179a-34: dbang gi don nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba
T02D2477:179a-35: slob dpon rgyal ba bzang po dpal sbas pa zhes
T02D2477:179a-36: bya bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2477:179a-38: // / ru lag rgyang gi gtsug lag khang du rgya
T02D2477:179a-39: gar gyi mkhan po aa badh'u t'i ba'i zhal snga
